hero.text: Striving to translate creative and inventive ideas straight into efficient and future-proof implementations.

my-life.title: My Life
my-life.text: My name is Philip, also known as BlvckBytes. I’m {{myAge}} years old and have always been interested in all types of engineering.

education.title: Education
education.text: Although I’m mostly self-taught, I have graduated at a higher technical college of computer since.

pursuits.title: Pursuits
pursuits.text: Besides web design and full-stack web development, I’m also working with low level hardware and engineer my own circuits.

frontend.title: Frontend development
frontend.text: You already have a finished design and now need to translate it to a fully responsive, interactive and well-maintainable web-app?

backend.title: Backend development
backend.text: Need persistent data, users, permissions, dynamic content and other creative features? I got you covered!

ui-ux.title: UI/UX design
ui-ux.text: If there are enough predefined properties of your idea, we can work out a fully custom design using feedback to create iterations.

hosting.title: Hosting And Deployment
hosting.text: I will set up the project in a live environment and provide you with directions for further maintaining, if desired.

frontend-design.headline: Turning ideas into a concrete design
frontend-design.text: I believe that every successful project needs to be properly planned ahead, which includes designing the layout for all viewports, deciding on color-schemes, animations and interactive features.

frontend-development.headline: Turning concrete designs into working apps
frontend-development.text: This is where the magic happens! Once we agree on a design, I can implement it as a fully responsive, interactive and cross-device working application, providing all frontend functionality.

backend-development.headline: Adding astonishing functionality to your app
backend-development.text: Managing users, permissions, adding validation, having persistent models and much more… Everything is possible, thanks to this modern stack.

deployment.headline: Launching the finished product into the web
deployment.text: It’s time to let the world interact with your shiny new product, provide extremely high availability and keep scalability in mind!
